segments.text: Good morning ! The Inland hotel . How may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I ’ d like to book a room for Friday night and Saturday night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . What kind of room would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A single room please . I hope you ’ re not fully booked .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A single room ? That ’ s fine . In whose name shall I make the booking ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Jones . According to your website , the nightly rate is $ 50 , including breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We offer a 20 % discount for guests staying of Friday and Saturday . The total cost will be $ 80 , including breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . I look forward to seeing you on Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could I just take your credit card number please ? I should mention that there is a cancellation charge of $ 20 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s fine . My credit card number is ...
segments.speaker: S2
